verses.content: LALPA chu a ropui a, nasataka inpâk ding a nih; Ei Pathien khawpuiah, a tlâng inthienga chun.
Insâng zâwnga mawitak, khawvêl po po hlimna chu, Zion tlâng chu a nih, hmar tieng panga, Lal ropuitak khawpui chu.
A lal inahai chun Pathien chun kulbîng insâng a nizie ân hriettir a.
Ngai ta, lalhai chu an pung khâwm a, An fe tlâng tah a nih.
An hmuh a; chuongchun, mak an tih a, An lunginzîng a, an tlân hmang ta vak a.
Chutaka chun inthinnain a man a, Nuhmei nau invawi natna angin a man bawk a.
Khawsak thliin, Tarsis lawnglienhai chu i suksiet a.
Sipaihai LALPA khawpuiah, ei Pathien khawpuia chun, Naa ei hriet ang ngeiin ei hmu tah; Pathienin chu khawpui chu kumkhuoa dingin sukdet a tih.
Aw Pathien, i biekin sûng rila chun, I ngilneizie hi kan ngaituo tah.
Aw Pathien, i hming ang ngeiin, Nangma inpâkna chu kâwlkaw- dawng chenin a um a; I kut changtieng chu felnain a sip a nih.
I rorêlhai leiin, Zion tlâng chu lâwmtakin um sienla, Juda naunuhai chu hlimtakin um raw se.
Zion chu vêlin fe huol unla, A râlvêng in insânghai khawm chu tiem ro.
A kulhai chu inchik ngun unla, A lal inhai chu ngaituo ro; Ruolthar hung um nâwkhai kuoma in hril theina dingin.
Hi Pathien hi kumkhawtluonga ei Pathien a ni ding a ni sih a, Thi chen khawma a mi ṭhuoitu ning a tih.
